In just filed court papers Camille asks a judge to deny Kelsey Grammer 's request to dissolve their 13 year marriage while they continue battling over their 120 million dollar estate. Camille writes in the court papers, It is my understanding that( Kelsey Grammer ) is seeking to terminate the marriage solely for the reason that he intends to remarry as soon as possible.`` I don't believe that is a sufficient reason to prejudice my rights to our estate. The Frasier star appeared on the Late Show with David Letterman Thursday night and sounded resolute about his plans for a quickie divorce from Camille, so he can tie the knot with Kayte Walsh soon.``

He said: I feel he has been punished twice for the same offence.`` I choose to judge him by the work he has done for me, for the Government and the country. Mr Andy Coulson , 43, left the News of the World in January 2007 after its then-Royal editor Clive Goodman and private investigator Glenn Mulcaire were jailed for hacking into mobile voicemails.
